title: Hotel, travel companies take a hit as rains lash North India
description: Amit Damani, co-founder of villa and bungalow rental company StayVista, said business has been impacted in the hills of North India and it would be down by 50%."Interestingly, demand has increased at places such as Sohna and Kurukshetra as people are rescheduling their holiday destination," he added.
